valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 28 Jan 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 29 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low just west of north Trafalgar 986 expected just east of sardinia 989 by midnight tonight

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 at first. In northeast, southerly or southeasterly 3 to 5.
Sea state
In southwest, very rough, becoming rough later. in northeast, moderate or rough.
Weather
In southwest, occasional rain or snow. In northeast, fair.
Visibility
In southwest, moderate or good, occasionally very poor. In northeast, good.
